definition: finely chopped meat or vegetables/powdered or fragmentary
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: He breaketh in pieces the strong together with the weak for He regardeth not any man.
sentences.chinese: 他把強者與弱者一同化爲齏粉，因爲他目中無人。
